abstract: The performance artist Marina Abramovic describes her plans for a new center bearing her name in upstate New York. Designed by the architects Rem Koolhaas and Shohei Shigematsu, it will be a place where visitors will have to promise to stay for at least six hours at a time.

headline.main: Special Chairs and Lots of Time: Marina Abramovic Plans Her New Center
headline.print_headline: Design for Abramovic Art Center to Be Revealed
